reviewText: 4 classic movies for kids. I especially bought it for The Ransom of Red Chief. It is a very funny movie.

I bought this video because my 4 year old niece loved the play, Ransom of Little Red Chief. The movie was very dark and the story had not been modernized in any way. Ma and Pa actually drove a horse and buggy! It was 90 minutes of pure boredom. We never did watch the other movies in the disc.
